text: The 2015 European Modern Pentathlon Championships was held in Bath, Great Britain from 17 to 23 August 2015. The event was a direct qualification event for the 2016 Summer Olympics, with the eight highest finishers in the men's and women's individual events gaining quota places for their National Olympic Committee at the 2016 Games. ==Medal summary== ===Men's events=== {| |- |Individual | Arthur Lanigan-O'Keeffe | Valentin Prades | Riccardo De Luca |- | Team | Valentin Belaud Christopher Patte Valentin Prades | Ilia Frolov Aleksander Lesun Egor Puchkarevskiy | Jan Kuf Ondřej Polívka David Svoboda |- | Relay | Andriy Fedechko Dmytro Kirpulyanskyy | Bence Harangozó István Málits | Tullio De Santis Valerio Grasselli |} ===Women's events=== {| |- |Individual | Laura Asadauskaitė | Élodie Clouvel | Lena Schöneborn |- | Team | Freyja Atkinson Kate French Samantha Murray | Janine Kohlmann Annika Schleu Lena Schöneborn | Claudia Cesarini Alice Sotero Gloria Tocchi |- | Relay | Annika Schleu Lena Schöneborn | Svetlana Lebedeva Ekaterina Khuraskina | Lina Batulevičiūtė Emilija Serapinaitė |} ===Mixed events=== {| |- |Relay | Camilla Lontano Valerio Grasselli | Katsiaryna Arol Ilya Palazkov | Donata Rimshayte Aleksandr Kukarin |} ===Medal table=== ==References== ==External links== *Results 2015 Category:2015 in modern pentathlon Category:2015 in British sport Modern pentathlon Category:August 2015 sports events in the United Kingdom Category:Modern pentathlon competitions in the United Kingdom Category:International sports competitions hosted by the University of Bath
title: 2015 European Modern Pentathlon Championships
